	    唯美同人完结=["唯美小说::2601::::w","同人小说::2602::::w"]
	    
//分类生成
	function parse(data,y){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	  try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
	  try {tag = args[3];
u=tag=="w"?'https://cxb-pro.cread.com/cx/new/catelistnew?uid=127995117&cnid=10013&version=8.1.4&flid='+parseInt(url/10)*10+'&thirdCateId='+url+'&sortType=1&bookStatus='+y+'&wordnumType=0&pageSize=20&curpage={{page}}':y;
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}
	
	
function FlexBox(title, url, num){
	let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
		 
		 
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
		
		分类list = 开启的分类.split(",")

var 分类result = [];
	
  var i=0;
	 if(分类list[i]<=7){
["🔖男频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
}
   else if(分类list[i]>=8){
	["🔖女频🔖"].forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x)))
		})
		}
	
			
for(i in 分类list){
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁连载🔖::::1")))
	a = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"连载");
	a.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,连载分类)))
		})
		
	 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(分类[分类list[i]]+"🍁完结🔖::::1")))
	b = eval(分类[分类list[i]]+"完结");
	b.forEach(x=>{
		 分类result.push(FlexBox.apply(null,parse(x,完结分类)))
		})
	}
JSON.stringify(分类result)
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}

✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)

4  仅女榜
5  旧的发现列表x
✱✱若发现列表没变更，长按列表顶栏，弹出菜单选“刷新”，收起列表再摊开。

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1';
num=!type?'第{{$.chapterid}}章 ':'';
if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}
l=lock?'[锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;

//不显示卷名
result=!type?result:'';
</js>

}else{page=page}

}
list
</js>

key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有列表
if(JSON.parse(result).info.Datas){
json=JSON.parse(result).info.Datas;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('https://www.missevan.com/sound/getsearch?s='+key+'&type=3&page_size=10&p='+page));

//判定json里是否有列表
if(json1.info.Datas){
json2=json1.info.Datas
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

exploreUrl:
<js>
sort=[];
	push=(title,url,type,fp)=>sort.push({
		title: title,
		url: url,
		style: {
				layout_flexGrow: fp,
				layout_flexBasisPercent: type
			}
	});
	u="https://apiv2hans.aixdzs.com/sort"
	xx=(a,b)=>{
		return `list,{"method": "POST","body":'{"bookTypeId":"${a}","type": "${b}","pageNum": "{{page}}"}'}`;
	}
	fls = JSON.parse(java.post(u,'',{}).body());
	push("最新",'',1,1)
	for(f of fls.data.allType){
		push(f.categoryName,u+xx(f.bookTypeId,1),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("大热",'',1,1)
	for(l of fls.data.allType){
		push(l.categoryName,u+xx(l.bookTypeId,2),0.25,0.25);
	}
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	push("——",'',0.25,0.25)
	//完本:3
	JSON.stringify(sort);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
$.lastChapter
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
s="2c6689f91ee4d4e87d798397d47310ebbe1dad79ixdzs";
for (i = 0, h = ""; i < 8; i++) {
	x="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789";
	r = parseInt(Math.random() * (36 - 0 +1) + 0, 10);
	h += x.charAt(r);
}
a=String(Math.round(new Date()));
sha = s + h + a + h;
sha1 = java.digestHex(sha,'SHA-1');

b = baseUrl.match(/"chapterId":(\d+),"bookId":"(\d+)"/)
u=source.getKey();
url = u + "/chapter/content,";
post=`{
  "method": "POST",
  "body":'{"chapterId": ${b[1]},"bookId":"${b[2]}"}',
  "headers":{"checkSumDTO":'{"appid":"ixdzs","checksum":"${sha1}","curtime":"${a}","nonce":"${h}"}'}
}`

result = java.ajax(url+post);
</js>$.data.chapter.chapterContent

bookSourceComment:
# 获取UID和token
isGet=false
if(isGet){
resp=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://h5.lc1001.com/h5/login,{"method":"POST","body":"pcd=账号&pwd=密码"}'))
java.log('请复制 UID: '+resp.uID)
java.log('请复制 token: '+resp.token)}
# 移动端 H5 和 app 不能同时登录，建议抓取 H5 上的 token，填写在章节地址中。

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("1701019k").getBytes(),"DES");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AQIDBAUGBwg="));
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
String(decrypt(JSON.parse(result).DATA.CTXT)).replace(/{{title}}/,'')
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page=java.getElement("@@class.pagination@a.0@b.1");
var ys = String(page).match(/\d+/);
var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

variableComment:
✱✱输入数字 变更发现列表：
1  男榜+女榜  (默认列表)
2  女榜+男榜
3  仅男榜
4  仅女榜
5  旧的发现列表x
✱✱若发现列表没变更，长按列表顶栏，弹出菜单选“刷新”，收起列表再摊开。

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;

		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
uri = String(uri)
    .replace('chapterList', 'content')
    .replace('.html', '/');
_ = {
    result: {
        list: []
    }
};
push = __ => _.result.list.push(__);
$.list.map($ => {
    if ($.name) {
        push({
            name: $.name,
            volume: true
        });
    }
    $.list.map($ => {
        if ($.has_content == 1) {
            url = java.base64Encode(uri + $.id + '.html');
            $.url = `data:;base64,${url},{"type":"${type}"}`;
            return push($);
        }
    })
})
JSON.stringify(_);
</js>$.result.list[*]

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
source_url = baseUrl.replace('/004?','/005?');
data = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data;

con  = data.map($=>{
	  // year = $.year;
l =	$.data.map(($,i)=>{	
		intro =  '【'+$.qishu+'】';
		url =  baseUrl.replace(/qishu=.*&bkId/,"qishu="+$.qishu+ "&bkId"); 				
return	 JSON.stringify({"intro":intro,"url":url});
	});
return l
	}).join(',');
	$ = JSON.parse(JSON.parse(JSON.stringify("["+con+"]")));

n = 0;
v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:n;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:n;
url = $[x].url;

result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data;

if($.length>1){
		y = '\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换期刊(默认0)\n🎯当前期刊：序号🔺'+x+'🔻'+$[x].intro+(x==0?' (默认)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\n❤序号🔺'+i+'🔻'+$[i].intro;
	}
result.tocUrl = $[x].url;
result.remark = y;
}

result = JSON.stringify(result);

}
catch(e){
	result = JSON.parse(result).data;
	result.tocUrl = baseUrl;
	result = JSON.stringify(result);
}
</js>

for(m in l){

// Error: 下载链接为空

2022-08-15
@tjjj812
可搜，有分类，有预览图，能下载
在线看网站是按照字数分页的，所以没有目录，最佳食用方式是下下来看。
把【类型】改为【文本】就可以在线看了。
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
不要用网页版编辑这个书源！！！
网页版有bug
如果编辑了之后要到手机端把【类型】改为【文件】，
把详情页下载url规则改为
【@js:java.get("bookDownURL")】
原看帮网，搞了一遍通过详情预处理来进行解析，并通过get方法获取文件地址的方式获取文件，站点也有ZIP可下，有需要的可以改成下载ZIP
需要设置本地文件存储位置才能正确下载。
用手机写js写的脑仁疼。。。

function sign(list){
    var sb='2bb6ffe20b1eff00';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="cabf8a3adca20e831d7e96267f709032";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*同站一大堆
修复搜索，可设置源变量限制搜索数量
优化by:游客2580
搜索加载by:Thomas&&youke2580
同类型网站可以自行替换网址*/

ruleSearch.author: $.author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果

            json = eval("(" + json.replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(")", "") + ")")
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
//md5加密开始
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {

loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') }

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);

    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {

}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}

var convertToWordArray = function(string) {

};

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
h = "https://m.wpxs.cc/"
q = "?q=" + encodeURIComponent(java.get('key'));


c = "Hm_lvt_="+~~(new Date().getTime()/1e3);

head = {
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: String(h+"s"+q),
	cookie: String(c)
}

hm = ";hm="+java.head(h+"user/hm.html"+q, head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

Get = java.get(h+"user/search.html"+q, head);
JSON.parse(Get.body())
.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));
</js>

ruleContent.content: @js:"\n点击章节链接即可下载整本书籍\n"+baseUrl

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}

ruleContent.content:
<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	java.log(CCC[0]+"----"+CCC[1]);
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");


/*	
//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }
*/

</js>
